snippet: Private insurance companies, like Blue Cross Blue Shield of Massachusetts, are showing how medical costs can be cut while improving care.
abstract: Editorial observes that Blue Cross and Blue Shield of Massachusetts has shown in the last three years how private insurance companies can lead the way in the struggle to control healthcare costs.
lead_paragraph: Private insurance companies, like Blue Cross Blue Shield of Massachusetts, are showing how medical costs can be cut while improving care.
